features: Enjoy Food with Less Fat or Oil: With Ultrean air fryer you can enjoy the same fried and crispy foods with less fat and grease

Hassle-Free Operation: With accessible buttons and an easy cooking set up, It comes with an auto switch off timer (0-30mins) and adjustable temperature setting (180°F-400°F)
Easy to Clean: It has a nonstick pan, heat-resistant handle, and a detachable dishwasher safe basket, so it’s easy to cook and clean the unit after cooking
Contemporary Design: With an LCD display and a bonus recipe book to help you prepare your fried food, snacks, grilled, and baked foods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From Kitchen Disaster to Culinary Success
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying that the Ultrean Air Fryer has revolutionized my culinary adventures! As a self-proclaimed food enthusiast with a penchant for fried delights, I have always been on the lookout for a healthier alternative to traditional deep frying. Lo and behold, the Ultrean Air Fryer came into my life, and it has exceeded all expectations!First things first, let's talk about the design. The sleek black exterior of this air fryer immediately caught my eye, and it seamlessly fits into any modern kitchen decor. The LCD digital screen adds a touch of sophistication, making it easy to navigate through the various settings and cooking modes. It's like having a mini-computer dedicated solely to perfecting your favorite dishes.Now, let's dive into the cooking performance. The Ultrean Air Fryer boasts a generous 4.2-quart (4-liter) capacity, providing ample space for family-sized portions. Whether I'm frying chicken wings, roasting vegetables, or baking crispy French fries, this air fryer delivers exceptional results every time. The nonstick frying pot ensures effortless cleaning, saving me valuable time and elbow grease.One of the standout features of the Ultrean Air Fryer is its oilless cooking capability. As someone who used to shy away from fried foods due to health concerns, this was a game-changer. With just a fraction of the oil required for traditional frying methods, I can now enjoy guilt-free indulgence without compromising on taste. The hot air circulation technology ensures that my food is evenly cooked and delightfully crispy on the outside, while retaining its juicy goodness on the inside.I must mention the UL certification, which speaks volumes about the safety and quality of this appliance. Knowing that the Ultrean Air Fryer has undergone rigorous testing and meets the highest industry standards provides peace of mind during every cooking session. It's essential to have confidence in the tools we use in our kitchen, and this air fryer certainly delivers on that front.Let's talk about the user experience. The Ultrean Air Fryer is incredibly user-friendly, even for those who are not particularly tech-savvy. The intuitive interface and clear instructions ensure a seamless cooking process. I appreciate how I can easily customize the temperature (ranging from 180°F to 400°F) and cooking time with just a few taps on the control panel. It's like having a personal sous chef guiding me through the culinary journey.Now, let me share a funny anecdote that showcases the versatility of the Ultrean Air Fryer. One day, in a moment of culinary bravado, I decided to experiment with unconventional ingredients. I attempted to air fry a batch of pickle chips, hoping to recreate the deep-fried delicacy found at county fairs. To my surprise, the Ultrean Air Fryer not only cooked them to perfection but also managed to retain the tangy flavor and crunch that I adore. I was able to enjoy a healthier version of a guilty pleasure without leaving my home!Lastly, the customer service provided by Ultrean deserves a special mention. I had a minor issue with the air fryer's power cord, and their responsive and friendly support team quickly resolved the matter. The 1-year warranty provided further reassurance that I was investing in a durable and reliable product.In conclusion, the Ultrean Air Fryer has been a game-changer in my kitchen. Its sleek design, impeccable cooking performance, oilless cooking capability, and user-friendly interface make it an indispensable tool for any cooking enthusiast. Whether you're a health-conscious individual or a fried food aficionado, this air fryer delivers mouthwatering results that will leave you craving more. Say goodbye to greasy messes and hello to culinary success with the Ultrean Air Fryer - it truly deserves its 5-star rating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This will change your life
reviews.reviewText: Two reasons this will change your life - 1 - fries and 2 - wings. Not only that, you can have them whenever you want them, they are both incredibly delicious and way healthier than the deep fried versions. I've successfully made both and I'd bet that most people wouldn't have any idea that zero oil was used. It's super easy to use, super easy to clean and absolutely a life changing purchase.Another great feature is that it contains the heat very well. I don't even notice the heat in my kitchen, unlike if I had the oven on at 360 - 400 degrees.The only downside I can see is if you need to cook for several people. It's perfectly sized for one person but I imagine if you wanted to make enough for 4-5 people, it would be a hassle. It does work best when you can space the food on the tray and not have layers. And that means single servings. I'm sure there are larger ones you can buy if that's a problem.Fries - The key is to use a russet potato. All I do is slice it up to the size of fries that I want, drop them in the basket, turn it on 360 for about 10 minutes and then 400 for about 5 and I'm presented with delicious, perfectly cooked and crispy on the outside fries. I experimented with soaking the potatoes like others say, but I didn't notice much of a difference. I also didn't find that adding any oil was necessary. If I get a craving for fries and I have a potato in the house, I'm eating delicious and healthy fries twenty minutes later.Wings - Wings are almost as easy and fast. I buy them precut from the grocery store and just give them a coating of salt and some seasoning. No oil at all. I cook about 15 minutes at 360 until they are brown all over and then up the heat to 400 for about another 10 minutes until they crisp up. From there, I take them out and coat them with whatever sauce I want and I have a significantly healthier alternative to deep fried wings and just as satisfying. They do not dry out the way they would in a conventional oven.If you're a single guy, you need this. And imagine the astonishment of your friends when you tell them how you've been losing weight - by eating more fries and wings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well, Cooks food well, easy to use, food is flavorful. Just a little bulky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Every household needs an airfirer.
reviews.reviewText: My roommates and I got an air fryer, and it changed my life. Decided to get one for my parents and they use it pretty much every day. The complained of a weird flavor for the first few uses, but that went away after about a week or two. The beeping noise is really loud when the food is done, but this is a great machine. Great size too! Cooks a lot at once.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not only is it pretty, it's easy to clean, simple functions, love the coated pan.I'd highly recommend this Air Fryer if you're looking to purchase one.Cooks the food evenly, thoroughly and foods cone out crispy.I love this product, I definitely made the right choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game-changer in the kitchen
reviews.reviewText: I’ve wanted an air fryer for a long time, and finally caved on this one. So glad that I did!It heats up quickly and cooks food evenly. It’s easy to clean and the basket is a decent size. My only complaint (and maybe this is user error) is figuring out how to stop it if I take something out early. When you remove the basket, it stops cooking, but when you close it again it resumes and I haven’t been able to figure out how to turn it off without unplugging it.Other than that, I love it, and it’s perfect for first time buyers.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great, looks great, easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: We've had this since Christmas and we've used our oven and toaster oven way less. Frozen fries are very easy, chicken strips, fish and chips, all easy. Google search is your friend for recipes. Reheating pizza and restaurant fries taste way better too. Cleaning is very easy as well. You will lose those little rubber feet on the basket if you aren't careful. I'm down to 2 out of 4, it does not effect performance at all. It will just rub your OCD the wrong way like it does mine. Overall, happy with the purchase, worth it.Also, if you register your product you will probably get offered a free gift. I chose two USB-C cables, took about a month to show up but they will show up. However, me being in Canada and the items shipping from the US, I was dinged about $25 on duty, so not free. They declared the value at $100 USD, which made it $128.12 CAD at the time. $6.41 in GST, $8.97 in PST and a $9.95 Handling Fee. If I had known that, I would have passed on the cables that I currently have no use for. Maybe one day they will become relevant, I'm sure they will, just not today.

Für unter 50.- Euro ein sehr gutes Gerät. Mir gefällt besonders gut die Beschichtung des Frittierkorbes ( für 3 Personen ) und des herausnehmbaren Einlegebodens. Ich reinige diese möglichst schonend mit Faserlappen oder Abwaschbürste und höchstens etwas Abwaschmittel. Ich werde es nicht in die Abwaschmaschine tun. Das Gerät wird aussen nur warm aber niemals heiss und der Kochgeruch ist auch kaum wahrnehmbar. Die ersten paar Mal gebrauchen und dann geht der Plastikgeruch auch weg und immer vor Inbetriebnahme die Gebrauchsanleitung lesen und sich daran halten. Es wäre toll, wenn es dieses Gerät auch von 80-230 Grad gäbe. Aber auch so bekommt man wunderbar zartes Fleisch gebraten. Auch als Ersatz eines Grills, da man Würste auch schön braun werden.

Una de mis mejores compras! Llegó más rápido de lo previsto, muy fácil de usar, y superó mis expectativas. El sabor de los alimentos no se altera como había leído por acá cuando hice la compra. Me arriesgué y me di cuenta de que en el instructivo dice claramente lo que tienes que hacer para evitar olores a plastico/teflón (que básicamente es partir un limón y meterlo por 15 min a 400° y dejarlo ahí otra media hora) si funciona y tu comida queda perfecta.
Semplice da usare e facile pulizia

reviews.reviewTitle: Grande capacité, encombrement réduit et facilité d'utilisation
reviews.reviewText: Il faut acheter un livre de recettes (sur Amazon on peut trouver à moins de 10 €, encore moins chers (2 €) pour Kindle. Plus pratiques.J'ai découvert que la friteuse est très intéressante pour réchauffer des portions de pizzas ou tartes (elles gardent le côté croustillant!)Finalement, j'ai eu un petit souci avec une des gommettes qui assurent que la grille ne glisse pas. J'ai écris par email au service technique et ils m'on ensuite renvoyé, depuis les États Unis, un jeu complet. Excellent!
